TrafficIPC Class Reference

Interface for a traffic inter process communication (ipc) that communicates traffic changes to a destination process/module. More...

Detailed Description

Interface for a traffic inter process communication (ipc) that communicates traffic changes to a destination process/module.

Disturbances &  disturbances
)  [pure virtual]
 

Get all disturbances from a specific provider.

Parameters:
provider A unique provider ID.
disturbances Will contain all the disturbances from the provider if the fetch was successful.
Returns:
True if the fetch was successful.
